summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2016 MERCEDES-BENZ METRIS. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING AT VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE AIR BAGS WARNING LIGHT ILLUMINATED. THE CONTACT WAS CONCERNED ABOUT THE SAFETY OF DRIVING THE VEHICLE WITH INOPERABLE AIR BAGS. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO MERCEDES-BENZ OF ANAHEIM LOCATED AT 5395 E LA PALMA AVE ANAHEIM, CA 92807, HOWEVER, THE MECHANIC WAS UNABLE TO DUPLICATE THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED NOR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER HAD NOT BEEN INFORMED OF FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 54,516.
